title: Password issues
body:
OK so the exact same password that I've used for league just over a year now suddenly won't work, so I do what any half intelligent person would do and click the link to create a new password since there seems to be an issue. This is when it all goes to shit the only password accepted is over 23 characters long, 1 off the limit, so now slightly pissed I make that my password and then go to change it back to the original since you can't just reuse a password. Now nothing I put down is acceptable. Even though my original password followed all the specifications it won't accept it 

tl;dr passwords f*cked, send help

I also forgot to mention this also happened the day before but after I entered my password around 20 times it worked (I've been sitting here for over an hour for the people who are just going to tell me to try that again)
